title: Honoring Sabrina R. Housh as recipient of the Edward Weisband Award for Distinguished Achievement in Political Science
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Sabrina R. Housh upon the occasion of
her designation as recipient of the Edward Weisband  Award  for  Distin-
guished Achievement in Political Science

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to act, in accord with
its  long-standing  traditions, honoring the youth of today, and leaders
of tomorrow, whose character and academic  achievements  best  exemplify
the ideals and values cherished by this great State and Nation; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body  is  justly  proud  to  honor
Sabrina  R.  Housh  upon the occasion of her designation as recipient of
the Edward Weisband Award for  Distinguished  Achievement  in  Political
Science at the State University of New York, Binghamton University; and
  WHEREAS,  This auspicious award is presented to a student of merit who
has demonstrated unusual creativity, made an unusual contribution to the
Binghamton University's Department of Political  Science,  and  who  has
manifested  a  depth  and abiding commitment to public affairs or public
service; Sabrina R. Housh of Vestal, New York, is one such student; and
  WHEREAS, Poised eagerly with enthusiasm and determined  purpose,  this
scholar now stands honorably, with just pride in her accomplishments and
in eager anticipation of future challenges, understanding and appreciat-
ing the caring counsel and support provided by her teachers and parents;
and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the  practice  of  this  Legislative  Body that when
students of such noble aims  and  accomplishments  are  brought  to  our
attention,  they should be celebrated and recognized by all the citizens
of this great Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor Sabrina R. Housh upon the occasion of her designation as recipient
of  the Edward Weisband Award for Distinguished Achievement in Political
Science; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Sabrina R. Housh, Vestal, New York.
